ctx: induction ll as [| x ll' IH].
exceptions.exn: In environment X, Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x i : nat x : X ll' : list X j : nat IH : map fst (link i ll' j) = list_an i (length ll') Unable to unify "map fst (link i ll' j) = list_an i (length ll')" with "map fst (link (S i) ll' (lc x + j)) = list_an (S i) (length ll')".

original: induction ll as [| x ll' IH]. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. f_equal. apply IH.
